rows.label: qst200903_msg001
rows.name:
I can't believe it...
How...how is this happening?!

rows.label: qst200903_msg003
rows.name:
You can say that again. An Armu
just stormed right into our shop.
Completely trashed the place.

rows.label: qst200903_msg004
rows.name:
And thanks to that, the windmill's
busted, so now we can't make
any flour.

rows.label: qst200903_msg005
rows.name:
This is the worst. We're going to be out
of business until we can get it repaired.

rows.label: qst200903_msg007
rows.name:
We had a batch of your amazing Lucky
Dawn Bread and our bellies are full of
fortune! We'll help you with your shop!

rows.label: qst200903_msg009
rows.name:
Oh, you're lifesavers. Are you sure
you have the time, though?

rows.label: qst200903_msg010
rows.name:
Sure we're sure! We've gotta help each
other out in times of need, don't we?

rows.label: qst200903_msg011
rows.name:
That's really kind of you, lass. If I ever
have kids, I'd want my daughter to
grow up to be just like you!

rows.label: qst200903_msg012
rows.name:
Well then, I hope you don't mind
me bossing you around for a bit.

rows.label: qst200903_msg013
rows.name:
We'll need to get the mill up and
running before we can do anything,
really.

rows.label: qst200903_msg014
rows.name:
Otto's in charge of the windmill.
He should be at Saets Lumber Co.
about now, near the town entrance.

rows.label: qst200903_msg015
rows.name:
Would you mind going to fetch him
for me?

rows.label: qst200903_msg016
rows.name: Not at all! We'll do that right now!

rows.label: qst200903_msg017
rows.name: Come on, guys, let's go find Otto!
